creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: red embroidery and applique with small blue squares of blue and white batik; center square surrounded by many bands and borders of many different applied elements, primarily red and white; wide top band, also embroidered, ends with long grey ties; backed with grey cotton with faint red stripe
title: Baby Carrier
